channel.title: Cinema 4d Death Machine
channel.description:
This is my first model Using Cinema 4d, I Hope you guys like it. Overall Image: [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/33u3lat.jpg[/img]
WireFrames:
-Perspective: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2sb766f.jpg[/img]
-Side: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2boeq8.jpg[/img]
-Front: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/b3swpd.jpg[/img]
Almost Forgot MuzzleFlash: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2lve4g6.jpg[/img]
If anyone has any tips for me, please, Tell me! =D

item.title: Cinema 4d Death Machine
item.dc:creator: @darkrush darkrush
item.description:
@darkrush wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:11, topic:401753”]Since you would rather not keep this in pm…

The model is fine but I do not believe you made with 100% on your own. I believe you followed a tutorial to make it, Because of the simple fact of looking at your other models. I do believe in progress but for your “1st” model in C4D I don’t believe that at all. You don’t go from making the very simple and rather bad looking swords, To a mini gun WHILE switching into a hole new program. It doesn’t work that way.[/quote]dont doubt the kid i made a sword recently and i saw the frame i cul make this outa prims and stuff on metasequoia i u want me to will

Read full topic

item.description:

Since you would rather not keep this in pm…

The model is fine but I do not believe you made with 100% on your own. I believe you followed a tutorial to make it, Because of the simple fact of looking at your other models. I do believe in progress but for your “1st” model in C4D I don’t believe that at all. You don’t go from making the very simple and rather bad looking swords, To a mini gun WHILE switching into a hole new program. It doesn’t work that way.

It’s just cylinders put together…
[/quote]There is more in his model then that…[/quote]

?

item.title: Cinema 4d Death Machine
item.dc:creator: @Quartereater Quartereater
item.description:
@Quartereater wrote:

The Wanderer:

Lol what the hell happened to that stick sticking in the air. Has like one hundred triangles squished all into one area.

If your referring to the Handle, im new to modeling with cinema 4d. I tried to smooth it out with no avail.
P.S. Your post made me lul. =D, Thanks for posting!
